name: yiisoft/yii2-queue
description: Yii2 Queue Extension which supported DB, Redis, RabbitMQ, Beanstalk, Gearman, Kafka, AWS SQS, STOMP, Filesystem

suggest.php-enqueue/amqp-ext: Needs for support of AMQP with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/amqp-lib: Needs for support of AMQP with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/rdkafka: Needs for support of Kafka with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/sqs: Needs for support of AWS SQS with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/dbal: Needs for support of Doctrine Dbal queue with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/redis: Needs for support of Redis queue with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/fs: Needs for support of filesystem queue with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/gearman: Needs for support of Gearman queue with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/pheanstalk: Needs for support of Beanstalk queue with queue interop
suggest.php-enqueue/stomp: Needs for support of STOMP queue with queue interop
